data.description: This 2 bedroom, 1 bath rancher is situated on a 0.22 acre lot, comes with a large fenced in back yard, RV parking, no HOA and is conveniently located close to shopping and schools. This diamond in the rough has so much potential, just bring a little elbow grease and an imagination and turn this house into a home. Call and schedule your showing today.
